title: Main account permanently suspended for no reason
body:
Username: Cryptid
Email: pgaiinukez@gmail.com

So today, I get home from school, turn on my computer, and open the LoL client, I tried to log in and it came up with this: http://prntscr.com/b51yd3
It told me to check my email, so I had a look and it came up with this:
http://prntscr.com/b51zzu

The only thing that I could think of that would have caused this, is MkLoL/MkJogo, which I used many months ago, and received a short suspension for (24 hours I think), I immediately uninstalled the program and haven't used it or anything else rule breaking since. 
I really do want/need my account back as I have spent hundreds of dollars ($890) purchasing skins and champions etc for myself and sometimes others.
I would extremely appreciate if a Riot staff member could sort this big issue out. 

Thankyou,
Cryptid

replies.body:
Hey there,

Bans for use of third party software are pretty accurate, however if you do genuinely believe it was a false ban feel free to do exactly what your ban notice says and [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support.

Note: Player Support will not be able to disclose what tool it was you were using nor when the use of these tools was detected to maintain the integrity of their anti cheat system.
